topics: affect, affective chronometry, mood disorders, mind wandering
participants: participants with and without mood disorders

features.name: angry
features.coding:
Wording unclear, but rating of present intensity of emotion
1 = not at all
7 = extremely

features.name: emotion_chronometry
features.coding: Estimate of how long current emotional state lasted in minutes

7 = extremely

features.name: mind_wandering

wording unclear, but roughly: Are you thinking about anything else other than what you are currently doing?
0 = no
1 = yes
